scripts.copy-wasm: cp ../../pkg/kalam_link_bg.wasm src/ && cp ../../pkg/kalam_link.js src/ && cp ../../pkg/kalam_link.d.ts src/ && npm run patch-cache-buster
scripts.patch-cache-buster: sed -i.bak "s|module_or_path = new URL('kalam_link_bg.wasm', import.meta.url);|const wasmUrl = new URL('kalam_link_bg.wasm', import.meta.url); wasmUrl.searchParams.set('v', Date.now().toString()); module_or_path = wasmUrl;|" src/kalam_link.js && rm -f src/kalam_link.js.bak
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-wasm && npx tsc
scripts.rebuild: cd ../.. && wasm-pack build --target web --release --features wasm --no-default-features && cd sdks/typescript && npm run build
